title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error message is displayed.
EB:
Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set. To reproduce this bug, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item to the template.
2. Do not set the dataset for the table report item.
3. Try creating a new table group.
User should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
